mapper.select:
select t.id, t.carno, t.matchid, m.planid, m.materialname, m.storename as sourcename, m.targetname, t.storename, m.weight, e.suttle * 0.001 suttle, m.counts, t.createoperaname, to_char(t.createdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') createdate, t.usermemo from l_storeout_t t left join l_storeout_item_t m on (t.matchid = m.matchid and m.validflag > 0) left join m_measure_t e on (t.matchid = e.matchid and e.validflag > 0) where t.validflag > 0
and t.createdate>= to_date(#{begintime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.createdate <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and m.planid like '%' || #{planid}||'%'
and m.matchid like '%' || #{matchid}||'%'
and t.carno like '%' || #{carno} ||'%'
and m.materialname like '%' || #{materialname}||'%'
and m.targetname like '%' || #{targetname} ||'%'
and t.storename like '%' || #{storename}||'%'
order by t.createdate desc

select count(matchid)carcounts,sum(suttle)suttle,sum(counts) counts from (select t.matchid, sum(nvl(e.suttle, 0) * 0.001) suttle, sum(nvl(m.counts, 0)) counts from l_storeout_t t left join l_storeout_item_t m on (t.matchid = m.matchid and m.validflag > 0) left join m_measure_t e on (t.matchid = e.matchid and e.validflag > 0) where t.validflag > 0
and t.createdate>= to_date(#{begintime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.createdate <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and m.planid like '%' || #{planid}||'%'
and m.matchid like '%' || #{matchid}||'%'
and t.carno like '%' || #{carno} ||'%'
and m.materialname like '%' || #{materialname}||'%'
and m.targetname like '%' || #{targetname} ||'%'
and t.storename like '%' || #{storename}||'%'
group by t.matchid)

select b.matchid, b.operatype, b.carno, b.matchid, c.planid, c.itemid, c.taskcode, c.orderno, c.sourcecode, c.sourcename, c.middlemancode, c.middlemanname, c.sourceplace, c.targetcode, c.targetname, c.materialcode, c.materialname, c.snumber counts, c.suttleapp weight, c.ship, nvl(t.tare*0.001, 0) tare, c.measureunit, m.isormeasure from l_applicationbill_t b left join l_applicationbill_item_t c on (b.matchid = c.matchid and c.validflag > 0) left join l_curr_temp_t t on (b.matchid = t.matchid and t.validflag > 0) left join m_operaconfig_t m on b.operatype = m.operatype where b.validflag = 1 and b.types = 0 and t.sflag != 2 and t.sourcetime is null and ((t.tare > 0 and m.isormeasure = 1) or m.isormeasure = 0) and b.carno = #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by b.createdate desc,c.itemid

select wm_concat((select l.workpointcode from l_workline_item_t l where l.fid = b.routeid and l.nodecode = 'SOUT')) nodecode from l_applicationbill_t b left join l_applicationbill_item_t c on (b.matchid = c.matchid and c.validflag > 0) left join l_curr_temp_t t on (b.matchid = t.matchid and t.validflag > 0) left join m_operaconfig_t m on b.operatype = m.operatype where b.validflag = 1 and b.types = 0 and t.sflag != 2 and t.sourcetime is null and ((t.tare > 0 and m.isormeasure = 1) or m.isormeasure = 0) and b.carno = #{carno, jdbcType = VARCHAR} order by b.createdate desc,c.itemid
